title: Build Your First AI Automation!
subtitle: Part 1: learn how to setup n8n and make your first AI Automation, a content creation workflow that makes carousels and videos!
author: Sabrina Ramonov üçÑ
content_html:
In this 3-part video series, I’ll teach you everything you need to know to start building AI Automations in n8n.

It’s difficult to learn this skill via passive reading, so please follow along this Youtube tutorial:

To support my free AI education: HIT LIKE + LEAVE A COMMENT🙏

What is the workflow?

  • Use AI to research topic

  • Use AI to make carousel/video

  • Post to social media platforms

Who is this for?

  • Small businesses that want to consistently post on socials

  • Creators who want to repurpose their Tiktok/Youtube videos into different media format (e.g. video → carousel)

  • Building personal or faceless brand channels

  • Posting daily news updates to your audience

  • Entertainment style faceless videos

Next Steps

This tutorial walks through the basics of setting up this powerful content workflow. Treat it as a base template.

To improve it further, spend lots of time experimenting with different visual styles and text outputs.

In the next video, I’ll show you how to use the n8n AI Agent.

OIdies But Goodies…

Here are previous tutorials you may have missed!

  • 3 simple tips to unlock ChatGPT genius mode

  • Easy social media system in n8n & Make

  • Explaining AI agents vs AI workflows

  • Vibe coding Blotato with Cursor AI

  • AI wealth creation blueprint

  • My first long youtube ever!

If you LOVE this newsletter, please SHARE it to help teach more people for FREE!

Share
